title: "the" connected script
content:
This is killing me. Can’t place this script font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103063748im_/http:/typophile.com/files/the_4036.jpg)
author: lewwillig

comments.content: Ouch, this is very little for us to work with.
I could swear we’ve had this before, or something very similar. Could you maybe post a bigger crop of the image (more context)?

I think it looks like Spoleto (a.k.a. Aktuelle, OptiSport Script). See attached sample from the Script Guide.

- Mike Yanega

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103063748im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Spoleto_4349.gif)

The alltime favourite retroscript [Athletic Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103063748/http:/typophile.com/node/62641) with its various followers looks close, but not identical. Maybe you can work with that …

EDIT: Late, with a similar solution …
The e is the critical part in Athletic Script et al. in my opinion. (If they all have the same e, which I don’t know)
